thought: To craft a purpur_slab, I need to place 3 purpur_pillars in a row in the crafting grid. I will start by moving the first purpur_pillar from slot 10 to slot 1. I will now move the second purpur_pillar from slot 10 to slot 2, to the right of the first purpur_pillar. I will now move the third purpur_pillar from slot 10 to slot 3, to the right of the second purpur_pillar.
